unit.setTimer("timer",1)

Preset_4 = 15000 --export

Preset_7 = 45000 --export

if DB_sync == true then 
RGB = (json.decode(databank.getStringValue('RGB')))
-- get RGBH from DB or use static values --
DBr = RGB.r*RGB.h
DBg = RGB.g*RGB.h
DBb = RGB.b*RGB.h
else
DBr = color.r
DBg = color.g
DBb = color.b
end

if not databank then
    system.print("ERROR: no databank found")

else
    --Databank[1].setStringValue()
   -- if Databank then Databank[1].setStringValue("RGB",ScreenRawOutput) end
    --Databank.getKeyList()
    if not databank.hasKey("AGGAlt") then 
        aggtarget = 1000
        databank.setStringValue("AGGAlt",json.encode(aggtarget))
    else
        local DBAGG = (json.decode(databank.getStringValue('AGGAlt')))
        aggtarget = DBAGG
    end
end
--Databank.setStringValue("AGGAltitude",json.encode(aggtarget))

psound('AGG-cont-startup.mp3')

agg = findElements("AntiGravityGeneratorUnit")
Databank = findElements("DatabankUnit")
core = findElements("CoreUnitDynamic")[1]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
getGlobals()

if  agg[1].getFieldStrength () < 0.1 then
    aggstate = 0 else aggstate = 1 end

zeroatmosphere = math.floor(planet.atmosphereThickness)

aggbase = agg[1].getBaseAltitude()
aggtarget = agg[1].getTargetAltitude ()

local shipVelocity = vec3(construct.getVelocity()):len()
altitude = math.floor(core.getAltitude ())

-- Gets speed along the vertical vector
local velocity_vector, vertical_vector = vec3(construct.getVelocity()), (vec3(construct.getWorldPosition()) - vec3(planet.center)):normalize()
local vertical_speed = -vertical_vector:dot(velocity_vector)

vertical_speed = velocity_vector:len()
distance_to_travel = math.abs(aggtarget-altitude)
if vertical_speed > 0 then
    traveltime = distance_to_travel/vertical_speed
    traveltimescreen = get_time_from_seconds(traveltime)
else
    traveltimescreen = '-'
end

databank.setStringValue("AGGAltitude",json.encode(aggtarget))
for  i = 1, screenCount do 
    sendData = string.format("%s,%.3f,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%.3f,%s,%.3f,%.3f,%.3f,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,", aggstate, aggtarget, active,Preset_1,Preset_2,Preset_3,Preset_4, DBr, DBg, DBb,aggbase,traveltimescreen,Max_AGG_height,altitude,spaceEngineMinAltitude,Preset_5,Preset_6,Preset_7,Preset_8,zeroatmosphere)
    screen[i].setScriptInput(sendData)
          end

agg = findElements("AntiGravityGeneratorUnit")
if  agg[1].getFieldStrength () < 0.1 then
    aggstate = 0 else aggstate = 1 end
core = findElements("CoreUnitDynamic")[1]
aggbase = agg[1].getBaseAltitude()
aggtarget = agg[1].getTargetAltitude ()
local shipVelocity = vec3(construct.getVelocity()):len()
altitude = math.floor(core.getAltitude ())

local shipVelocity = vec3(construct.getVelocity()):len()
altitude = math.floor(core.getAltitude ())

-- Gets speed along the vertical vector
local velocity_vector, vertical_vector = vec3(construct.getVelocity()), vec3(core.getWorldVertical())
local vertical_speed = -vertical_vector:dot(velocity_vector)

distance_to_travel = aggtarget-altitude
if distance_to_travel * vertical_speed > 0 then
    traveltime = distance_to_travel/vertical_speed
    traveltimescreen = get_time_from_seconds(traveltime)
else
    traveltimescreen = '-'
end

active = false
for  i = 1, screenCount do screen[i].setScriptInput(string.format("%s,%.3f,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%.3f,%s,%.3f,%.3f,%.3f,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,", aggstate, aggtarget, active,Preset_1,Preset_2,Preset_3,Preset_4, DBr, DBg, DBb,aggbase,traveltimescreen,Max_AGG_height,altitude,spaceEngineMinAltitude,Preset_5,Preset_6,Preset_7,Preset_8,zeroatmosphere))
          end

psound('AGG-cont-shut.mp3')

local handlers = {}

handlers['1']=function() 
for i = 1, aggCount do agg[i].toggle()  
    if aggstate == 0 then
            psound('AGGenabled.mp3')     
        else
            psound('AGGdisabled.mp3')
    end
end end
--handlers['Preset_1']=function() for i = 1, aggCount do agg[i].setTargetAltitude (Preset_1) psound('preset-l.mp3') end end
--handlers['Preset_2']=function() for i = 1, aggCount do agg[i].setTargetAltitude (Preset_2) psound('preset-l.mp3') end end

--handlers['Preset_7']=function() for i = 1, aggCount do agg[i].setTargetAltitude (Preset_7) psound('preset-l.mp3') end end
--handlers['Preset_8']=function() for i = 1, aggCount do agg[i].setTargetAltitude (Preset_8) psound('preset-l.mp3') end end
handlers['manualAlt']=function(alt) for i = 1, aggCount do agg[i].setTargetAltitude (alt)  psound('AGGset-new-h.mp3')end end
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
for i = 1, screenCount do
    local ok, err = pcall(function()
        local output = screen[i].getScriptOutput()
        if #output > 0 then
            screen[i].clearScriptOutput()
                
            local parsed = json.decode(output)
            local command, args = parsed[1], table.move(parsed, 2, #parsed, 1)
    
            if handlers[command] then handlers[command](table.unpack(args or {})) end
        end
    end)
end
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

json = require('json')
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- find elements
function findElements(ClassName)
    local FoundElements = {}
    for key, value in pairs(unit) do
        if type(value) == "table" and type(value.export) == "table" then
            if value.getClass then
                if value.getClass() == ClassName then
                    table.insert(FoundElements, value)
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return FoundElements
end
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- tableLen
function tableLen(T)
    local count = 0
    for _ in pairs(T) do
        count = count + 1
    end
    return count
end
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
screen = findElements("ScreenUnit")
screenCount = tableLen(screen)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
agg = findElements("AntiGravityGeneratorUnit")
aggCount = tableLen(agg)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

function get_time_from_seconds(seconds)
  local parts = {}
  
  if seconds > 86400 then
    local days = math.floor(seconds / 86400)
    table.insert(parts, days .. 'd')
    seconds = seconds - 86400 * days
  end
  
  if seconds > 3600 then
    local hours = math.floor(seconds / 3600)
    table.insert(parts, hours .. 'h')
    seconds = seconds - 3600 * hours
  end
  
  if seconds > 60 then
    local minutes = math.floor(seconds / 60)
    table.insert(parts, minutes .. ' min')
    seconds = seconds - 60 * minutes
  end

  if seconds > 0 then
    table.insert(parts, math.floor(seconds) .. ' sec')
  end

  return table.concat(parts, ' ')
end

local Atlas = require "atlas"
Helios = Atlas[0]

function getGlobals()
     currentWorldPos = vec3(construct.getWorldPosition())
     closestPlanetIndex = 0
     local planetDistance = 999999999999
     for i, v in pairs(Helios) do
      if (currentWorldPos - vec3(v.center)):len() < planetDistance then
       planetDistance = (currentWorldPos - vec3(v.center)):len()
       closestPlanetIndex = i
      end
     end
     planet = Helios[closestPlanetIndex]
     currentPlanetName = planet.name[1]
     currentPlanetRadius = planet.radius --TODO Remove?
     currentPlanetCenter = planet.center
     currentPlanetGM = planet.GM
     currentPlanetMaxStatic = planet.maxStaticAltitude
     hasAtmosphere = planet.hasAtmosphere
     local altTable = { [1]=6637, [2]=3426, [4]=7580, [26]=4242, [27]=4150, [3]=21452, [6]=4498, [7]=6285, [8]=3434, [9]=5916 } -- Measured min space engine altitudes for: Madis, Alioth, Talemai, Sanctuary, Haven, Sicari, Sinnen, Thades, Teoma, Jago
     spaceEngineMinAltitude = altTable[planet.id] or 0.5353125*(planet.atmosphereThickness)
     noAtmosphericDensityAltitude = planet.atmosphereThickness or 0

     -- get altitude --
     local function vectorLen(x,y,z)
      return math.sqrt(x * x + y * y + z * z)
     end
     local cWCOM = construct.getWorldCenterOfMass()
     local cWCOMx, cWCOMy, cWCOMz = cWCOM[1], cWCOM[2], cWCOM[3]
     local cPCx, cPCy, cPCz = currentPlanetCenter[1], currentPlanetCenter[2], currentPlanetCenter[3]
     atmoaltitude = vectorLen(cWCOMx-cPCx, cWCOMy-cPCy, cWCOMz-cPCz) - planet.radius or 0
end

function psound(filename)
    if not system.isPlayingSound() then
           system.playSound(filename)
    end
end
